smac.util

Class SmacFileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.util.SmacFileUtils

  • public class SmacFileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    SmacFileUtils is a class which groups static methods pertaining to file operations used throughout the SMAC daemon.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
